title: Maruti Suzuki applies for Bharat-NCAP safety ratings for some vehicles
description: Maruti Suzuki has applied for Bharat New Car Assessment Programme (Bharat-NCAP) safety ratings for select vehicles, following Tata Motors' SUVs Safari and Harrier, which received 5-star ratings last year. Bharat-NCAP, launched in August, aims to enhance vehicle safety standards beyond mandatory regulations, aligning with global benchmarks.
